headline: MarketAxess launches electronic trading platform for foreign investors in Indian debt
summary: MUMBAI (Reuters) -MarketAxess Holdings said on Tuesday it has launched electronic trading services for Indian government bonds, making it the first platform to give foreign investors direct access to the market.  The platform will be interlinked with the Clearing Corporation of India's (CCIL) trading system NDS-Order Matching platform, allowing foreign investors to bid and offer securities directly along with local investors, the U.S.-based firm said.
